core_finding: PPI vs H2RA changes 14-day risk of strict CIGIB
estimand: Effect of initiating PPI (vs H2RA) within 0-24h on 14-day risk of strict CIGIB (time zero at ICU+24h)
tier_target: Target trial emulation (observational causal under assumptions)
semantic_boundary: Allowed: "associated with" / "consistent with a causal effect under TTE assumptions"; report effect sizes + CI; emphasize residual confounding possible. Not allowed: definitive causality claims.
forbidden_implications: proves causation; establishes superiority; clinical recommendation; guideline-level claims
evidence_modules: IPTW balance diagnostics; sensitivity suite (planned); external validation

core_finding: PPI vs H2RA changes 14-day risk of CDI
estimand: Effect of initiating PPI (vs H2RA) within 0-24h on 14-day CDI risk (time zero at ICU+24h)
tier_target: Target trial emulation (observational causal under assumptions)
semantic_boundary: Allowed: effect estimates with uncertainty; acknowledge outcome ascertainment limitations. Not allowed: mechanistic claims.
forbidden_implications: proves causation; mechanistic claims; clinical recommendation
evidence_modules: Sensitivity on outcome definitions (planned); negative-control window (planned); external validation

core_finding: PPI vs H2RA changes 28-day (or in-hospital) mortality
estimand: Effect of initiating PPI (vs H2RA) within 0-24h on 28-day (or in-hospital) all-cause mortality (time zero at ICU+24h)
tier_target: Target trial emulation (observational causal under assumptions)
semantic_boundary: Allowed: cautious interpretation; highlight competing risks and residual confounding. Not allowed: claims of benefit/harm without robustness.
forbidden_implications: proves causation; treatment recommendation; claims beyond observed follow-up
